description:
Lorena is Professor and Director of the Open Source Software Office at George Washington University. Mechanical Engineer with a Ph.D. in Aeronautics. Woman in STEM, referent for python community.



Social Networks:

More About PyCon Colombia at http://www.pycon.co
title: Keynote Lorena Barba
